Package Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObject
      • Model.Character
        • Model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Player
extends Character
    Class for the player character, stores things about him/her
    Author:
    Wes Rodgers
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Constructor. Initializes the player character with 3 max HP and 3 current HP. This can be changed to fit whatever we actually decide on.
